name: 退款提示
title: Notice of Resource Deduction for Refund Behavior
content:
Dear Voyager:

Due to your voluntary refund behavior, the corresponding Astral Gem/Blessing of Hope and other resources will be deducted.

If the number of Astral Gems in the account is less than the refund portion at the time of deduction, the number of Astral Gems in the account will be deducted to a negative value. You can purchase additional Astral Gems to make up for the difference.
If dishonest refund behavior occurs, an account ban is risky after the deduction reaches a particular condition.

Maintaining a fair and orderly gaming environment requires your joint efforts. Thank you for your support and cooperation. If you have objections to this handling result, please provide feedback through in-game customer service.
